comment._content: Royal Navy Officers Adams, Cecil Norman 26.10.1899 Penang - 30.04.1987 A/S.Lt. 15.11.1918 A/Lt. ? Lt. 15.09.1921 (retd 05.10.1922; own request) Lt.Cdr. (retd) 15.09.1929 (reactivated 13.10.1939) (demobilized 02.04.1940) ? - (10.1919) HMS Courageous (cruiser) 23.12.1921 - (04.)1922 HMS Yarmouth (light cruiser) 1927? - 25.10.1959 on RAN Emergency List on loan to Royal Australian Navy: 13.10.1939 - 03.12.1939 HMAS Cerberus (RAN training establishment/base, Williamstown, Victoria) (additional; for gunnery course) 04.12.1939 - 07.03.1940 HMAS Penguin IV (RAN reserve depot, Brisbane) (additional; for base staff Darwin) 08.03.1940 - 02.04.1940 HMAS Cerberus V (RANVR depot, Fremantle) (additional) www.unithistories.com/officers/RN_officersA.html
